Changes.LogName: NPC Manifestation - gives Kat a birthday
NPC Manifestation - gives Kat a birthday
NPC Exclusion NPCs to avoid Perfection issues

Entries.winter_Sat: People keep looking at me sideways. Small town like this, bound to be a few skeletons.$2#$b#Lucky for them, I'm not that kind of journalist. Unless of course one was to stand up.$3
Entries.winter_Wed: I've picked up some editing work on the side. Mostly pulp fiction nonsense, but it is what it is.$2
Entries.winter_Sun: Oliver doesn't seem too happy I'm still around. Ah well, at least he's staying quiet about it.#$b#I can deal with the odd death stare.$2
